description.value:
Traveller

Your origin does not belong to any particular city, town, or village; you feel best at home while out on the road. Whether you travelled alone, with a nomadic group, or alongside a traveling circus, your travels have brought you to a variety of cultures and people. What you learned upon your journeys propelled you to experience other new and exciting things.

Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma, Dexterity, Constitution, or Wisdom increases by 1.

Well Travelled. You learn two additional languages.

Skills. Choose one from: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Performance, Sleight of Hand, Survival.

Tools. You gain proficiency with one from the following: disguise kit, vehicles (land), a gaming set, navigator’s tools, or one musical instrument.

Languages. Common, plus one of your choice.
